title: ICE: -Zprint-type-sizes:  generators: overlap-locals.rs

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

labels.name: S-has-mcve
labels.description: A Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example has been found for this issue

body:
### Code from `src/test/ui/generator/overlap-locals.rs` ```Rust // run-pass #![feature(generators)] fn main() { let a = || { { let w: i32 = 4; yield; println!("{:?}", w); } { let z: i32 = 7; yield; println!("{:?}", z); } }; assert_eq!(8, std::mem::size_of_val(&a)); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.68.0-nightly (bdb07a8ec 2022-12-11) binary: rustc commit-hash: bdb07a8ec8e77aa10fb84fae1d4ff71c21180bb4 commit-date: 2022-12-11 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.68.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.6 ``` ### Error output `rustc src/test/ui/generator/overlap-locals.rs -Zprint-type-sizes` ``` ```
Backtrace
